name: com.ponyudev.sherpa-onnx
description: Unity integration for sherpa-onnx with editor installer for native libraries and models.

samples.description: Sample scene with Simple TTS, TTS with Progress, TTS with Config, and Cache Control panels.
Sample scene with File Recognition (offline ASR) and Streaming Recognition (online ASR with microphone).
Sample scene with VAD + ASR demo using microphone capture and voice activity detection.
